price: Yɛdii wͻn ho fεw bi kwa anaasε (yɛ) ani mmom na apa wͻn soͻ?”
arabic: أَتَّخَذۡنَٰهُمۡ سِخۡرِيًّا أَمۡ زَاغَتۡ عَنۡهُمُ ٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: attakhadhnāhum sikh'riyyan am zāghat ʿanhumu al-abṣāru
